•	Create artifacts such as use cases, and develop Use Case Diagrams, Activity Diagrams and Sequence Diagrams using MS Visio.

Emerging Talent in Technology Girls Day School Trust May 2015 The Girls Day School Trust were offering £4000 to an alumni who was seeking funds to further their career in technology. I applied due to the contribution I have made to the education of children and the elderly in technology, requesting the award to fund my quest to provide an equal opportunity for access to technology for everyone. This includes volunteering to help regional South Australia make a success of the new Digital Technologies curriculum being introduced into schools across the state this year, as well as providing additional discounted lessons in surrounding regional towns to help the elderly and job seekers improve their skills.  
 
The GDST had 3 finalists and decided to split the £4000, giving £3000 to the winner and £1000 to the runner up. I was the runner up and received £1000 to help me work towards my goals on improving technology education in regional areas.
